1605040.name: Jump Kid
1605040.description:
In a beautifully crafted world, explore the vast biomes and challenges in the world of Jump Kid. In a difficult platforming adventure, you will need more than wits to be triumphant. Explore through the lands of the green forests, boiling volcanoes, and the freezing winter lands to become the one and only one who made it to the top of the largest mountain ever created.


The basis of Jump Kid is you must get to the top of an extraordinarily high mountain, but with a small catch, you can only jump your way up. That means no walking, running, swimming, or flying! Hold your jump key to charge a jump, and do your best to get past the many obstacles and puzzles that await you.


The mechanics and gameplay of Jump Kid are designed to be as challenging and rewarding as possible. Precision and the player learning mechanics are a very vital part of the development of Jump Kid.


Jump Kid is still a work in progress and will continue to develop and become the best possible game it can be. Most gameplay elements are completed, and the primary focus is going into finishing all the levels and end game content. You can expect to find more updates by following my social media.

A long and challenging story
Hours of difficult optional challenges
Many collectables and rewarding prizes
Secrets, and secrets, and more secrets
Updates even after the games full release of new cosmetics, gameplay updates, and gamemodes.
1605040.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
